description: Bamboo extract & ground walnut shell exfoliate, removing dirt and impurities to leave skin looking smooth. Our Revitalising Facial Scrub uses Bamboo Extract and Walnut Shell Powder to lightly exfoliate the skin while removing unwanted dirt and impurities. A refreshing combination of Aloe Vera and Chamomile soothes the skin while Jojoba, Sesame and Rosehip Oils lightly hydrate your complexion, leaving skin feeling clean and smooth. Naturally created with: No synthetic fragrances, animal derivatives, artificial colours, harsh detergents, propylene glycol, petrolatum, phthalates, MEA / DEA / TEA, mineral oils, triclosan, sulphates, parabens, silicones and EDTA
name: Sukin Signature Revitalising Facial Scrub 125mL
